page.title: 12West Park Hospital 2
page.content:
West Park consists of wards laid out in villas so as to catch the sun. Towards the centre of the hospital are the departments such as the laundry, transport and the main hall and social centre. There is also a{church}-sadly out of use- but a new chapel is being created. West Park works in conjunction with the Dept. of Psychological Medicine/ Psychiatry at Epsom District Hospital.
A number of us are well or nearly well enough to leave and go to our homes or 'new' homes, hostels or 'group' homes. There are some lovely walks in the grounds with lawns, gardens and sports field and we proudly support one of the most varied collections of trees in the area for which we must thank past employees interest in horticulture.
